activities: Shoplet is an ecommmerce company with websites and operations in both the US and United Kingdom.  As part of operations personal information such as names, addresses, and email addresses are collected in both geographic locations.  Since Shoplet's corporate offices are located in New York, certain communications and customer information on its UK customers is accessed and utilized by personnel in the US.
personaldata: personal customer information such as name, address, email address and phone number - for billing and shipping of ordered prodcuts
recoursemech: In the event that a dispute arises relating to Shoplet.com's compliance with the US-EU Safe Harbor Framework, Shoplet.com has selected as an independent resource mechanism and agrees to utilize the services and procedures provided by the American Arbitration Association, ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program to preside over and hear any and all complaints with respect to compliance with the Framework(s). Additionally, Shoplet.com hereby agrees to comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) to investigate any and all unresolved complaints.
